send_to_cs: Send to CS if a subscriber mentions a medical issue or an adverse effect from using products from this brand
dos_and_donts: Do not share any medical advice or guidance to subscribers outside of recommending appropriate products or directing them to purchase the right item
Do not comment on their medical situations
Close the covo if the customer says they're receiving too many messages/we're texting them too often - don't send TMT
drive_to_purchase: If cx says they will be ordering soon, offer to schedule a call if they need further assistance with their purchase (shortcut OS) - do not upsell
templates: If cx already purchased, use specific TFP template
promo_and_exclusions: We do not offer any discounts for the SPECTRUM besides the Black Friday Sale discount
If cx reaches out looking for deals, you can share the Black Friday deals here: https://www.capillus.com/collections/black-friday-deals/?token=69JI4

54.customerMessage2: I measured my head and it is 22".  Which would be better for me Capillus PRO S2 or Capillus Pro?  Also if I order today when will it be shipped?  I am out of town a lot Friday until Monday and I don't want it delivered and sitting on my porch.
54.AgentMessage2:
Capillus: Thanks for letting me know. Regular caps fit most heads, up to 23" in circumference (comparable to a size 7 hat). Extra-large caps, comparable to a size 8 hat, are available upon request by scheduling a call with out customer service at: https://capillus.attn.tv/ai9f5wSzpVqX. For smaller hat sizes, as long as the cap is within 2 cm all around (3/4"), it is effective. Therefore, anyone with a head measuring 21" or larger will be fine with a standard Capillus cap.

Our processing time takes 2 business days. We aim to keep the shipping timeframe consistent, but it may be subject to change due to high volume sales. In the shopping cart, you will receive an Estimated Delivery Date and you will receive notification of any delay or cancellation of your order. Hope this helps!
54.AgentMessage3: Capillus: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
54.AgentMessage4: Capillus: Feel free to reach out anytime, I'm always here to help!
54.AgentMessage5: Capillus: Let me check on this with my team for you, I will be back with an update soon.
